title: FFPS
body: i was wondering how much fps would a NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 graphics card run at medium or high setting please help I don't wanna waste money on something that runs low fps I want something that can run atleast 100 plus fps

replies.body:
While I can't state specific numbers on what FPS you'll get with the GT 730, I *can* say that it exceeds our [recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements#wq2). In most situations, it should have no issue running League at medium or high settings at a stable 60FPS (the refresh rate of most displays). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
